title: -C SUBDIR download-url --archive  does not extract archive

labels.name: fix-implemented
labels.description: A fix is available, but has not been merged or released, yet.

body:
```shell
$> datalad create -c text2git testds; cd testds; mkdir out
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/testds        
[INFO   ] Running procedure cfg_text2git                                                                                
[INFO   ] == Command start (output follows) ===== 
[INFO   ] == Command exit (modification check follows) ===== 
create(ok): /tmp/testds (dataset)

$> datalad -C out download-url --archive http://swcarpentry.github.io/python-novice-inflammation/code/python-novice-inflammation-code.zip                                                
[INFO   ] Downloading 'http://swcarpentry.github.io/python-novice-inflammation/code/python-novice-inflammation-code.zip' into None 
http://swcarpentry.github.io/python-novice-inflammation/code/python-novice-inflammation-code.zip:   0%| | 0.00/7.22k [00                                                                                                                        download_url(ok): python-novice-inflammation-code.zip (file)
add(ok): out/python-novice-inflammation-code.zip (file)
save(ok): . (dataset)
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  download_url (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)

$> tree
.
└── out
    └── python-novice-inflammation-code.zip -> ../.git/annex/objects/jW/7k/MD5E-s7216--b3dad42a5675fa84821f520de09a2f81.zip/MD5E-s7216--b3dad42a5675fa84821f520de09a2f81.zip
```
so it just silently doesn't do anything to the archive.

without `-C` it works:

```shell
$> datalad  download-url --archive http://swcarpentry.github.io/python-novice-inflammation/code/python-novice-inflammation-code.zip    
[INFO   ] Downloading 'http://swcarpentry.github.io/python-novice-inflammation/code/python-novice-inflammation-code.zip' into None 
http://swcarpentry.github.io/python-novice-inflammation/code/python-novice-inflammation-code.zip:   0%| | 0.00/7.22k [00                                                                                                                        download_url(ok): python-novice-inflammation-code.zip (file)
add(ok): python-novice-inflammation-code.zip (file)
save(ok): . (dataset)
[INFO   ] Adding content of the archive python-novice-inflammation-code.zip into annex <AnnexRepo path=/tmp/testds (<class 'datalad.support.annexrepo.AnnexRepo'>)> 
[INFO   ] Initiating special remote datalad-archives 
[INFO   ] Finished adding python-novice-inflammation-code.zip: Files processed: 18, +git: 18 
action summary:
  add (ok: 1)
  download_url (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(dev3) 1 3307.....................................:Wed 30 Oct 2019 09:15:52 AM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/testds[master]
$> tree
.
├── code
│   ├── argv_list.py
│   ├── arith.py
│   ├── check.py
│   ├── count_stdin.py
│   ├── gen_inflammation.py
│   ├── line_count.py
│   ├── my_ls.py
│   ├── readings_01.py
│   ├── readings_02.py
│   ├── readings_03.py
│   ├── readings_04.py
│   ├── readings_05.py
│   ├── readings_06.py
│   ├── readings_07.py
│   ├── readings_08.py
│   ├── readings_09.py
│   ├── rectangle.py
│   └── sys_version.py
└── out
    └── python-novice-inflammation-code.zip -> ../.git/annex/objects/jW/7k/MD5E-s7216--b3dad42a5675fa84821f520de09a2f81.zip/MD5E-s7216--b3dad42a5675fa84821f520de09a2f81.zip
```

```shell
$> datalad --version
datalad 0.12.0rc6.dev39
```
